document.full_text: cannes poster girl and oscar-winning actress faye dunaway added some old school hollywood glamor to the croisette on sunday when cultural minister frederic mitterand named her an officer of the order of arts and letters at a ceremony in cannes.
document.title: faye dunaway honored at cannes film festival
lines_and_colors: cannes poster girl and oscar-winning actress faye dunaway added some old school hollywood glamor to the croisette on sunday when cultural minister frederic mitterand named her an officer of the order of arts and letters at a ceremony in cannes.
